usefulItems: 2 baking trays and baking paper, wire rack, oven
title: Anzac Biscuits

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 160°C. Line two baking trays with baking paper and set aside.
Place butter and golden syrup in mixing bowl then heat <b>2 min/60°C/speed 2<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl and blade with spatula, then heat again <b>1 min/60°C/speed 2<b>.
Add bicarbonate of soda and mix <b> <b>5 sec/speed 3<b>.
Add rolled oats, plain flour, brown sugar and desiccated coconut then mix <b>10 sec//speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix again <b> <b>10 sec//speed 4<b>.
Place approx. 30 small spoonfuls of mixture onto prepared baking trays and flatten to approx. 5 cm in diameter, allowing space for biscuits to spread during baking.
Bake for 8-10 minutes (160°C) until golden brown. Remove from oven and leave to cool on trays for 5 minutes then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely, or serve warm.

hintsAndTricks: Store biscuits in an airtight container until ready to use.
